sn48.51:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu viharati sālāya brāhmaṇagāme.
sn48.51:4.4: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci tiracchānagatā pāṇā, sīho migarājā tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
sn48.51:4.5: thāmena javena sūrena;
sn48.51:4.6: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
sn48.51:5.2: Saddhindriyaṃ, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
sn48.51:5.3: vīriyindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
sn48.51:5.4: satindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
sn48.51:5.5: samādhindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
sn48.51:5.6: paññindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati.
sn48.51:5.7: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci tiracchānagatā pāṇā, sīho migarājā tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
sn48.51:5.9: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
